page.title: 20DARTMOUTH'S HINTERLAND (2)
page.content: The owner of Capton farm is also a local councillor and vice chairman of the{Dartmouth Enterprise Group.}The group is presently organising a {community bus service}which will serve the local{hinterland}of Dartmouth. Initially one 17 seater bus will be put into service on the 17th August, opened by the Minister of Transport. Several drivers are being trained and licenced to P.S.V. standards and will operate the buses voluntarily. The bus will deliver farmers and villagers to their doors, following a route through Dartmouth, Blackawton and Dittisham. Fares are expected to be half the normal service rates.
